body.name: RiverRidge Somerset Single Door Corner Floor Cabinet, White
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 21 hrs 21 mins
features: Assembled dimensions: 14.5-in. L x 20.5-in. W x 32-in. H
Features one interior adjustable shelf, perfect for storing extra toiletries such as toilet paper, wash cloths, soaps and more
Petite corner cabinet maximizes storage in small spaces
Anchors to the wall for added stability
Give the bathroom a completely new look with additional Somerset Collection items.
body.description: Maximize storage capacity in the bathroom or laundry room with the RiverRidge Somerset Single Door Corner Cabinet that features a classic design and attractive detailing such as inset doors and side panels, coved top shelf and two-tone satin/mirror finish handles. Additional dimensions: top shelf: 14.5”L x 20.5” W x 13.38” D, overall cabinet interior: 17.75” W x 11” D x 27.5” H, interior shelves: 17.75” W x 11” D, space between interior shelves: adjustable (10.88” - 16.13”). Constructed of painted MDF; assembly required.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Complete the look with products from our Somerset Collection! Introducing our Somerset Bath Collection – where functionality meets elegance. Embrace the timeless charm of clean white finishes and sleek silver handles that effortlessly elevate your space. Perfect for both bath and laundry storage, these family-friendly products are designed with your convenience in mind. Our Somerset Bath Collection not only adds a touch of sophistication to your home but also offers practical solutions. Each piece features enclosed storage, ensuring your space stays clutter-free and organized. Worried about safety? Rest easy with our adjustable anti-tip wall anchors, providing extra stability and peace of mind, especially in homes with little ones.

Danbury Two-Door Corner Cabinet Brookfield Two-Door Corner Cabinet Somerset Tall Corner Cabinet Madison Tall Corner Cabinet Brookfield Tall Corner Cabinet Monroe Tall Corner Cabinet Color White White White 2 Colors Available White White Materials Painted MDF, Glass Windowpane Doors, Polished Silver or Matte Black Knob Painted MDF, Brushed Nickel Knob Painted MDF, Two-Tone Satin Mirror Handles Painted MDF, Silver Flat Pull Handle Painted MDF, Brushed Nickel Knob Painted MDF, Matte Black Handles Dimensions 25.5W x 18D x 31.5H Inches 25.25W x 18D x 31.81H Inches 26W x 18.31D x 70H Inches 23.31W x 16.88D x 63.88H Inches 24.81W x 17.57D x 68.25H Inches 24.69W x 17.5D x 63.81H Inches Weight Capacity 10 lbs Per Shelf 20 lbs Per Shelf 20 lbs per Shelf 20 lbs Per Shelf 20 lbs Per Shelf 15 lbs Per Shelf Special Features Magnetic Closure 1 Interior Adjustable Shelf, Magnetic Closure 1 Interior Adjustable Shelf, Magnetic Closure 1 Interior Adjustable Shelf, Magnetic Closure 1 Interior Adjustable Shelf, Magnetic Closure 2 Interior Adjustable Shelves, Magnetic Closure Style Windowpane-Style Plantation Shutters Inset Doors & Design Horizontal Grooves Plantation Shutters Vertical Grooves

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I am so pleased with the quality and finish of this cabinet. Perfect for a small 1/2 bathroom to store TP, towels etc. It was not difficult to put together and the picture instructions were excellent. The cam bolts were a bit tight to get in and you need to be gentle with screwing them in so the wood doesn't chip. But very worth the price paid. It is perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for a small bathroom space
reviews.reviewText: I like the magnetic door that seals easily. It looks great in a small bathroom space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Convenient Size and Shape
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to store spare toilet paper and such within reach of the toilet. Size is perfect to fit in the corner of the room and there is plenty of room inside for all the bathroom supplies.Construction is sturdy and finish is good. Only flaw was the top surface is somewhat rough and the paint had rubbed of one of the edges. Still very happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks great in the bathroom!
reviews.reviewText: This looks great in the bathroom! The room is very small and this unit was the perfect size for some much needed storage. Good quality and easy to assemble!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smaller size Perfect
reviews.reviewText: Perfect size for my needs. Easy to put together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Exactly as advertised. Seems sturdy enough for the price. I’m glad I bought it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I only gave this cabinet 3 stars because it took me a hour to get the stickers on the side panel off! Why a company would put stickers on the outside of a cabinet is crazy. After fighting with these very well stuck stickers it was pretty easy to assemble. It’s sturdy and nicely made. So unless they made a mistake on placement of the stickers be prepared to give it some much needed work to remove them before assembly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Simple and cute
reviews.reviewText: Fairly easy to assemble. Perfect little size for the corner spot in my bathroom. Not much storage space but enough to store a couple of toilet paper rolls and some toiletries.

reviews.reviewTitle: I like it. Good quality and size
reviews.reviewText: Nice quality and was, fortunately, larger than I thought it would be. I didn't measure the dimensions of the product description beforehand... but knew it would fit the bill even if a bit smaller. Turned out to be a great size. I could store spray dusters, Krylon art spray cans, WD40, and a plethora of other things. There is sufficient vertical space inside to put cans on the bottom or the shelf, or both. Advice: Hand-screw the screws in with a screwdriver. I started off by trying to use a power drill with screwdriver attachment and stripped the hole and/or screwhead a little. (Can't remember which.) It's decent quality, but not quality enough to use power tools for assembly, in my opinion
This product was very easy to assemble and seems quite sturdy. I bought 2 and put them in my bathroom which doesn’t have much storage. They look amazing and have provided alot of extra storage

I was pleasantly surprised with the quality! The cabinet material seems thick and the cabinet itself is very sturdy. Assembly was pretty straightforward; I was able to do it by myself. The dimensions are spot on. Fit in my corner perfectly.
Fit parfaitement la où je voulais
